feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 3:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -13
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
